org.jooby

Interface Err.Handler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Err.DefHandler
    Enclosing class:
    Err 

    public static interface Err.Handler
    Handle and render exceptions. Error handlers are executed in the order they were provided, the first err handler that send an output wins! The default err handler does content negotation on error, see Err.DefHandler.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    edgar

    • Method Summary

      All Methods  Instance Methods  Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handle(Request req, Response rsp, Err ex)
      Handle a route exception by properly logging the error and sending a err response to the client.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        void handle(Request req,
            Response rsp,
            Err ex)
     throws Throwable
        Handle a route exception by properly logging the error and sending a err response to the client. Please note you always get an Err whenever you throw it or not. For example if your application throws an IllegalArgumentException exception you will get an Err and you can retrieve the original exception by calling Throwable.getCause(). Jooby always give you an Err with an optional root cause and an associated status code.
        Parameters:
        req - HTTP request.
        rsp - HTTP response.
        ex - Error found and status code.
        Throws:
        Throwable - If something goes wrong.
